alert.note: Alert for Boulder And Jefferson Counties Below 6000 Feet, West Broomfield County; Central and South Weld County; Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 5:42PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Weld, southeastern Larimer and northeastern Boulder Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 541 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles northeast of Bellvue to Longmont, or along a line extending from 7 miles north of Fort Collins to 30 miles north of Denver. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Collins, Longmont, Loveland, Windsor, Firestone, Johnstown, Frederick, Wellington, Milliken, Berthoud, Mead, Severance, Timnath and Niwot. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Boulder And Jefferson Counties Below 6000 Feet, West Broomfield County; Central and South Weld County; Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County
